label: e_lmvdsrrw (PowerISA)
summary: Loads volatile Debug SRRs (DSRR0, DSRR1) from memory.

label: e_stmvdsrrw (PowerISA)
summary: Stores volatile Debug SRRs (DSRR0, DSRR1) to memory.

label: e_bdnz (PowerISA)
summary: Decrements CTR, branches if CTR != 0.

label: e_bdnzf (PowerISA)
summary: Decrements CTR, branches if CTR != 0 AND CR bit is false.

label: e_bdnzt (PowerISA)
summary: Decrements CTR, branches if CTR != 0 AND CR bit is true.

label: e_bdz (PowerISA)
summary: Decrements CTR, branches if CTR == 0.

label: e_bdzf (PowerISA)
summary: Decrements CTR, branches if CTR == 0 AND CR bit is false.

label: e_bdzt (PowerISA)
summary: Decrements CTR, branches if CTR == 0 AND CR bit is true.

label: e_add16is (PowerISA)
summary: Adds a 16-bit immediate shifted left by 16 bits.

label: e_cmp16i (PowerISA)
summary: Compares word with 16-bit immediate.

label: e_cmpl16i (PowerISA)
summary: Unsigned compare word with 16-bit immediate.

label: e_or2is (PowerISA)
summary: OR with 16-bit immediate shifted left by 16 bits.

label: e_and2is (PowerISA)
summary: AND with 16-bit immediate shifted left by 16 bits.

label: e_xor2is (PowerISA)
summary: XOR with 16-bit immediate shifted left by 16 bits.

label: e_dcbf (PowerISA)
summary: Flushes a data cache block.

label: e_dcbst (PowerISA)
summary: Stores a data cache block.

label: e_dcbt (PowerISA)
summary: Prefetches a data cache block.

label: e_dcbtst (PowerISA)
summary: Prefetches a data cache block for writing.

label: e_dcbz (PowerISA)
summary: Zeros a data cache block.

label: e_icbi (PowerISA)
summary: Invalidates an instruction cache block.

label: e_icbt (PowerISA)
summary: Prefetches an instruction cache block.

label: e_mbar (PowerISA)
summary: Ensures memory access ordering.

label: e_msync (PowerISA)
summary: Synchronizes memory accesses.

label: e_isync (PowerISA)
summary: Waits for previous instructions to complete.

label: e_wait (PowerISA)
summary: Waits for an interrupt.

label: lvx (PowerISA)
summary: Loads a 128-bit vector from memory into a Vector Register. Address must be 16-byte aligned (bits 60-63 of effective address are ignored).

label: stvx (PowerISA)
summary: Stores a 128-bit vector to memory. Address must be 16-byte aligned.

label: vsubuwm (PowerISA)
summary: Subtracts four 32-bit integers in parallel.

label: vmulouw (PowerISA)
summary: Multiplies the 1st and 3rd words of the source vectors to produce two 64-bit results.

label: vspltw (PowerISA)
summary: Copies a single word element from the source vector into all four word elements of the destination.

label: vperm (PowerISA)
summary: The signature AltiVec instruction. Constructs a new vector by selecting bytes from two source vectors based on a permute control vector.

label: vslw (PowerISA)
summary: Shifts each of the four words in vA left by the number of bits specified in the corresponding word of vB.

label: vcmpequw (PowerISA)
summary: Compares words for equality. Sets result bits to all 1s (True) or all 0s (False).

label: vsel (PowerISA)
summary: Bitwise selection. copies bits from vA if the corresponding bit in vC is 0, or from vB if vC is 1. (Like 'mux').

label: lxvd2x (PowerISA)
summary: Loads a 128-bit vector from memory into a VSX register. Does NOT require 16-byte alignment (unlike lvx).

label: stxvd2x (PowerISA)
summary: Stores a 128-bit VSX register to memory. Does NOT require alignment.

label: xvadddp (PowerISA)
summary: Adds two pairs of double-precision floating-point numbers.

label: xvmaddadp (PowerISA)
summary: Performs (A * B) + T on vectors of doubles.

label: xxpermdi (PowerISA)
summary: Selects two doublewords from the four available in source registers XA and XB based on a 2-bit selector.

label: xsadddp (PowerISA)
summary: Adds the low doubleword of two VSX registers (scalar operation). The high doublewords are undefined or zeroed.

label: dsub (PowerISA)
summary: Subtracts two 64-bit Decimal Floating Point numbers.

label: ddiv (PowerISA)
summary: Divides two 64-bit Decimal Floating Point numbers.

label: dcmpu (PowerISA)
summary: Compares two DFP numbers (Non-signaling on NaN).

label: dcmpo (PowerISA)
summary: Compares two DFP numbers (Signaling on NaN).

label: dctdp (PowerISA)
summary: Converts DFP Short (32-bit compressed) to DFP Long (64-bit).

label: drsp (PowerISA)
summary: Rounds DFP Long (64-bit) to DFP Short (32-bit compressed).

label: dcffix (PowerISA)
summary: Converts a 64-bit integer to DFP.

label: dctfix (PowerISA)
summary: Converts DFP to a 64-bit integer.

label: denbcd (PowerISA)
summary: Encodes a DFP number into BCD format.

label: ddedpd (PowerISA)
summary: Decodes BCD to DFP format.

label: diex (PowerISA)
summary: Combines a sign/coefficient from FRA and exponent from FRB.

label: dxex (PowerISA)
summary: Extracts the exponent from a DFP number.

label: dscli (PowerISA)
summary: Shifts the coefficient of a DFP number left.

label: dsri (PowerISA)
summary: Shifts the coefficient of a DFP number right.

label: xssubqp (PowerISA)
summary: Subtracts two 128-bit Quad-Precision floats.

label: xsdivqp (PowerISA)
summary: Divides two 128-bit Quad-Precision floats.

label: xssqrtqp (PowerISA)
summary: Computes square root of a 128-bit Quad-Precision float.

label: xscmpuqp (PowerISA)
summary: Compares Quad floats (Non-signaling on NaN).

label: xscmpopoqp (PowerISA)
summary: Compares Quad floats (Signaling on NaN).

label: xsnegqp (PowerISA)
summary: Negates a 128-bit Quad float.

label: xsabsqp (PowerISA)
summary: Computes absolute value of a Quad float.

label: xsmaxqp (PowerISA)
summary: Selects maximum of two Quad floats.

label: xsminqp (PowerISA)
summary: Selects minimum of two Quad floats.

label: xxinsertw (PowerISA)
summary: Inserts a 32-bit word from a GPR into a specific element of a VSR.

label: xxextractuw (PowerISA)
summary: Extracts a 32-bit word from a VSR into a GPR.

label: xxspltw (PowerISA)
summary: Replicates one word element across the entire vector.

label: lmw (PowerISA)
summary: Loads words from memory into registers RT through R31 (Context Switch).

label: stmw (PowerISA)
summary: Stores words from registers RT through R31 to memory (Context Switch).

label: lswi (PowerISA)
summary: Loads N bytes from memory into registers.

label: stswi (PowerISA)
summary: Stores N bytes from registers to memory.

label: slbia (PowerISA)
summary: Invalidates all Segment Lookaside Buffer entries (OS Management).

label: slbmte (PowerISA)
summary: Writes an SLB entry (Mapping effective to virtual address).

label: msgclr (PowerISA)
summary: Clears a pending doorbell interrupt (Inter-processor comms).

label: msgsnd (PowerISA)
summary: Sends a doorbell interrupt to another processor.

label: icbt (PowerISA)
summary: Prefetches an instruction cache block.

label: dcbtst (PowerISA)
summary: Prefetches a cache block signaling intent to modify (RFO - Read For Ownership).

label: attn (PowerISA)
summary: Stops execution and alerts the hardware debugger.

label: clrbhrb (PowerISA)
summary: Clears the hardware branch history buffer (Performance tuning).

label: tabortwc (PowerISA)
summary: Aborts a transaction if the condition is met (Word comparison).

label: tabortdc (PowerISA)
summary: Aborts a transaction if the condition is met (Doubleword comparison).

label: trechkpt (PowerISA)
summary: Updates the transaction checkpoint.

label: lxvl (PowerISA)
summary: Loads N bytes into a vector, where N is specified in a GPR.

label: stxvl (PowerISA)
summary: Stores N bytes from a vector to memory.

label: xxperm (PowerISA)
summary: General permute for VSX registers.

label: xxpermr (PowerISA)
summary: Little-endian optimized permute.

label: lswx (PowerISA)
summary: Loads N bytes from memory (N in XER).

label: stswx (PowerISA)
summary: Stores N bytes to memory (N in XER).

label: wait (PowerISA)
summary: Pauses execution to save power.

label: doze (PowerISA)
summary: Enters Doze power-saving mode (Supervisor only).

label: nap (PowerISA)
summary: Enters Nap power-saving mode (Supervisor only).

label: sleep (PowerISA)
summary: Enters Sleep power-saving mode (Supervisor only).

label: ripv (PowerISA)
summary: Enters Deep Sleep mode (Supervisor only).

label: dcbzl (PowerISA)
summary: Zeros a cache block (implementation defined size).

label: slbmfee (PowerISA)
summary: Reads the ESID part of an SLB entry.

label: slbmfev (PowerISA)
summary: Reads the VSID part of an SLB entry.

label: msgclrp (PowerISA)
summary: Clears a privileged doorbell interrupt.

label: msgsndp (PowerISA)
summary: Sends a privileged doorbell interrupt.

label: mfsr (PowerISA)
summary: Legacy 32-bit segment register read.

label: mtsr (PowerISA)
summary: Legacy 32-bit segment register write.

label: mfsrin (PowerISA)
summary: Indirect read of segment register using RB.

label: mtsrin (PowerISA)
summary: Indirect write of segment register using RB.

label: mfbhrbe (PowerISA)
summary: Reads a specific entry from the BHRB.

label: tsr (PowerISA)
summary: Suspends or resumes a transaction based on L.

label: tabortwci (PowerISA)
summary: Aborts transaction if word condition (Immediate) is met.

label: tabortdci (PowerISA)
summary: Aborts transaction if doubleword condition (Immediate) is met.

label: xsrintqp (PowerISA)
summary: Rounds Quad float to nearest Integer.

label: dctqpq (PowerISA)
summary: Converts DFP Long (64-bit) to DFP Quad (128-bit).

label: drdpq (PowerISA)
summary: Rounds DFP Quad (128-bit) to DFP Long (64-bit).

label: vcipherlast (PowerISA)
summary: Performs the final round of AES encryption (SubBytes, ShiftRows, AddRoundKey). No MixColumns.

label: vncipherlast (PowerISA)
summary: Performs the final round of AES decryption.

label: vsbox (PowerISA)
summary: Performs the SubBytes operation (S-Box lookup) on a vector.

label: vshasigmad (PowerISA)
summary: Performs the Sigma0/Sigma1 functions for SHA-512.

label: vpermxor (PowerISA)
summary: Permutes bytes from vA and vB, then XORs with vC. Used for finite field arithmetic.

label: bcdcfn. (PowerISA)
summary: Converts BCD National format to Signed Packed BCD.

label: bcdctn. (PowerISA)
summary: Converts Signed Packed BCD to National format.

label: bcdcfz. (PowerISA)
summary: Converts BCD Zoned format to Signed Packed BCD.

label: bcdctz. (PowerISA)
summary: Converts Signed Packed BCD to Zoned format.

label: bcdcfsq. (PowerISA)
summary: Converts a 128-bit signed integer to BCD.

label: bcdctsq. (PowerISA)
summary: Converts BCD to a 128-bit signed integer.

label: mulhd (PowerISA)
summary: Multiplies two 64-bit integers and returns the upper 64 bits of the 128-bit result (Signed).

label: mulhdu (PowerISA)
summary: Multiplies two 64-bit integers and returns the upper 64 bits of the 128-bit result (Unsigned).

label: mulhw (PowerISA)
summary: Multiplies two 32-bit integers and returns the upper 32 bits (Signed).

label: mulhwu (PowerISA)
summary: Multiplies two 32-bit integers and returns the upper 32 bits (Unsigned).

label: divsq (PowerISA)
summary: Divides a 128-bit signed integer by a 128-bit signed integer (using VSX pairs).

label: divuq (PowerISA)
summary: Divides a 128-bit unsigned integer by a 128-bit unsigned integer.

label: modsq (PowerISA)
summary: Computes remainder of 128-bit signed division.

label: moduq (PowerISA)
summary: Computes remainder of 128-bit unsigned division.

label: lbzci (PowerISA)
summary: Loads a byte bypassing the cache. Used for memory-mapped I/O.

label: lhzci (PowerISA)
summary: Loads a halfword bypassing the cache.

label: lwzci (PowerISA)
summary: Loads a word bypassing the cache.

label: ldci (PowerISA)
summary: Loads a doubleword bypassing the cache.

label: stbci (PowerISA)
summary: Stores a byte bypassing the cache.

label: sthci (PowerISA)
summary: Stores a halfword bypassing the cache.

label: stwci (PowerISA)
summary: Stores a word bypassing the cache.

label: stdci (PowerISA)
summary: Stores a doubleword bypassing the cache.

label: cp_abort (PowerISA)
summary: Aborts a hardware accelerator copy-paste sequence.

label: mcrxrx (PowerISA)
summary: Copies XER[OV, SO] to a Condition Register field.

label: scv (PowerISA)
summary: Performs a system call to a fixed vector address (Faster than 'sc').

label: rfscv (PowerISA)
summary: Returns from a vectored system call.

label: stop (PowerISA)
summary: Stops instruction execution and enters a power-saving state (replaces nap/doze on P9+).

label: urfid (PowerISA)
summary: Returns from an ultravisor interrupt.

label: setbc (PowerISA)
summary: Sets RT to 1 if CR bit is set, else 0. (Branchless logic).

label: setbcr (PowerISA)
summary: Sets RT to 1 if CR bit is clear, else 0.

label: setnbc (PowerISA)
summary: Sets RT to -1 if CR bit is set, else 0.

label: setnbcr (PowerISA)
summary: Sets RT to -1 if CR bit is clear, else 0.

label: xscmpexpdp (PowerISA)
summary: Compares exponents of two double-precision floats.

label: xsiexpdp (PowerISA)
summary: Inserts exponent from one double into another.

label: xsxexpdp (PowerISA)
summary: Extracts exponent from double as an integer.

label: xsxsigdp (PowerISA)
summary: Extracts significand from double as an integer.

label: xststdcdp (PowerISA)
summary: Tests if a double falls into a specific class (NaN, Inf, Zero, Denormal).

label: lxvp (PowerISA)
summary: Loads a 256-bit vector pair (two VSRs).

label: stxvp (PowerISA)
summary: Stores a 256-bit vector pair.

label: plxvp (PowerISA)
summary: Loads a 256-bit vector pair with 34-bit offset.

label: pstxvp (PowerISA)
summary: Stores a 256-bit vector pair with 34-bit offset.

label: xscvhpdp (PowerISA)
summary: Converts a 16-bit float to 64-bit double.

label: xscvdphp (PowerISA)
summary: Converts a 64-bit double to 16-bit float.

label: xvcvhpsp (PowerISA)
summary: Converts four 16-bit floats to four 32-bit floats.

label: xvcvsphp (PowerISA)
summary: Converts four 32-bit floats to four 16-bit floats.

label: sync (PowerISA)
summary: The master memory barrier. Ensures all previous instructions appear to complete before any subsequent instructions start. (L=0: Heavyweight, L=1: Lightweight/LWSYNC).

label: lwsync (PowerISA)
summary: Orders loads with loads, stores with stores, and loads with stores. Does NOT order stores with loads. (Encoded as sync 1).

label: rfid (PowerISA)
summary: Returns from an interrupt handler. Restores PC from SRR0 and MSR from SRR1.

label: tlbie (PowerISA)
summary: Invalidates a TLB entry corresponding to the address in RB.

label: slbie (PowerISA)
summary: Invalidates an SLB entry. Critical for memory management on Power systems.

label: wait (PowerISA)
summary: Stops instruction execution and places the processor in a lower power state until an interrupt occurs.

label: tbegin. (PowerISA)
summary: Initiates a hardware transaction. If the transaction fails, execution rolls back to this point. Sets CR0 based on success/failure.

label: tend. (PowerISA)
summary: Commits the current hardware transaction. If successful, memory changes become visible atomically.

label: tabort. (PowerISA)
summary: Forces a transaction failure and rollback.

label: vcipher (PowerISA)
summary: Performs one round of AES encryption (SubBytes, ShiftRows, MixColumns, AddRoundKey).

label: vncipher (PowerISA)
summary: Performs one round of AES decryption.

label: vshasigmaw (PowerISA)
summary: Performs the Sigma0/Sigma1/sigma0/sigma1 functions for SHA-256.

label: at (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs stage 1 address translation for current EL.

label: at (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs stage 1 address translation for write permission.

label: tlbi (ARMv8-A)
summary: Invalidates all TLB entries in the inner shareable domain.

label: tlbi (ARMv8-A)
summary: Invalidates TLB entries by Virtual Address.

label: mcr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Writes a general-purpose register to a coprocessor register (e.g., CP15).

label: mrc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reads a coprocessor register into a general-purpose register.

label: mcrr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Writes two general-purpose registers to a coprocessor (64-bit transfer).

label: mrrc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reads a coprocessor register into two general-purpose registers.

label: ldc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads memory into a coprocessor.

label: stc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores coprocessor contents to memory.

label: vmrs (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reads a VFP system register (like FPSCR).

label: vmsr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Writes to a VFP system register.

label: ldrexb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a byte and marks address as exclusive.

label: strexb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores a byte if address is still exclusive.

label: ldrexh (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a halfword and marks address as exclusive.

label: strexh (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores a halfword if address is still exclusive.

label: ldrexd (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a doubleword and marks address as exclusive.

label: strexd (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores a doubleword if address is still exclusive.

label: dcps1 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Switches execution to EL1 (Debug).

label: dcps2 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Switches execution to EL2 (Debug).

label: dcps3 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Switches execution to EL3 (Debug).

label: setpan (ARMv8-A)
summary: Enables/Disables PAN (Prevents kernel accessing user memory).

label: esb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Synchronizes errors.

label: csdb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Prevents speculative data consumption.

label: vldm (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads multiple VFP registers from memory.

label: vstm (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores multiple VFP registers to memory.

label: vcmp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Compares a floating-point value with #0.0.

label: vdiv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Divides two double-precision registers.

label: vabs (ARMv8-A)
summary: Absolute value of double-precision register.

label: vneg (ARMv8-A)
summary: Negates double-precision register.

label: vsqrt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Square root of double-precision register.

label: vfma (ARMv8-A)
summary: Fused multiply-add (Double).

label: vfms (ARMv8-A)
summary: Fused multiply-subtract (Double).

label: vcmp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Compares two double-precision values.

label: vmov (ARMv8-A)
summary: Moves data between Double registers.

label: vmov (ARMv8-A)
summary: Moves a Double register to/from two Core registers.

label: vcvta (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts double to integer, rounding to nearest.

label: vcvtn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts double to integer, rounding to nearest even.

label: vcvt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts between floating-point and fixed-point.

label: addg (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds an immediate to an address, modifying the Allocation Tag (MTE).

label: subg (ARMv8-A)
summary: Subtracts an immediate from an address, modifying the Allocation Tag (MTE).

label: cosp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Prevents speculation from reordering beyond this point.

label: cppp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Prevents cache prefetch prediction past this instruction.

label: rcw (ARMv8-A)
summary: Atomically updates a 128-bit descriptor in memory (Translation Hardening).

label: ldff1b (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads bytes speculatively; suppresses faults after the first active element.

label: ldff1h (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads halfwords speculatively; suppresses faults after the first active element.

label: ldff1w (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads words speculatively; suppresses faults after the first active element.

label: ldff1d (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads doublewords speculatively; suppresses faults after the first active element.

label: ldnf1b (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads bytes without faulting; returns 0 if fault occurs.

label: ldnf1h (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads halfwords without faulting.

label: ldnf1w (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads words without faulting.

label: ldnf1d (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads doublewords without faulting.

label: whilelo (ARMv8-A)
summary: Generates predicate for unsigned loop (while Xn < Xm).

label: whilels (ARMv8-A)
summary: Generates predicate for unsigned loop (while Xn <= Xm).

label: whilehi (ARMv8-A)
summary: Generates predicate for unsigned loop (while Xn > Xm).

label: whilehs (ARMv8-A)
summary: Generates predicate for unsigned loop (while Xn >= Xm).

label: cntp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Counts the number of true elements in a predicate.

label: ptest (ARMv8-A)
summary: Updates processor flags (NZCV) based on predicate state.

label: pfirst (ARMv8-A)
summary: Sets destination predicate to true only at the first active element.

label: clasta (ARMv8-A)
summary: Extracts element after the last active element.

label: clastb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Extracts the last active element.

label: lasta (ARMv8-A)
summary: Extracts element after last active (SIMD scalar destination).

label: lastb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Extracts last active element (SIMD scalar destination).

label: insr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Inserts scalar into bottom of vector, shifting other elements up.

label: ext (ARMv8-A)
summary: Extracts a vector from a pair (sliding window) using immediate byte index.

label: rev (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reverses the order of elements in the vector.

label: revb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reverses bytes within 16/32/64-bit elements.

label: revh (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reverses halfwords within 32/64-bit elements.

label: revw (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reverses words within 64-bit elements.

label: rbit (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reverses bits in each element.

label: sunpklo (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unpacks and sign-extends lower half of vector elements.

label: sunpkhi (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unpacks and sign-extends upper half of vector elements.

label: uunpklo (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unpacks and zero-extends lower half of vector elements.

label: uunpkhi (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unpacks and zero-extends upper half of vector elements.

label: sdot (ARMv8-A)
summary: Computes dot product of signed integers (AI Acceleration).

label: udot (ARMv8-A)
summary: Computes dot product of unsigned integers.

label: smax (ARMv8-A)
summary: Determines maximum signed value per element.

label: smin (ARMv8-A)
summary: Determines minimum signed value per element.

label: umax (ARMv8-A)
summary: Determines maximum unsigned value per element.

label: umin (ARMv8-A)
summary: Determines minimum unsigned value per element.

label: abs (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calculates absolute value of integers.

label: neg (ARMv8-A)
summary: Negates integers.

label: not (ARMv8-A)
summary: Inverts bits.

label: sdiv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Divides signed integers.

label: udiv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Divides unsigned integers.

label: fsqrt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calculates square root of floats.

label: fabs (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calculates absolute value of floats.

label: fneg (ARMv8-A)
summary: Negates floats.

label: fcadd (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs complex addition with rotation.

label: fcmla (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs complex multiply-accumulate.

label: saddv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Sums all active signed elements into a scalar result.

label: smaxv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Finds max signed element in vector.

label: umaxv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Finds max unsigned element in vector.

label: sminv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Finds min signed element in vector.

label: uminv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Finds min unsigned element in vector.

label: fmaxv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Finds max float in vector.

label: fminv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Finds min float in vector.

label: andv (ARMv8-A)
summary: ANDs all active elements into a scalar.

label: orv (ARMv8-A)
summary: ORs all active elements into a scalar.

label: eorv (ARMv8-A)
summary: XORs all active elements into a scalar.

label: scvtf (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts signed integers to floats.

label: ucvtf (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts unsigned integers to floats.

label: fcvtzs (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts floats to signed integers (Truncate).

label: fcvtzu (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts floats to unsigned integers (Truncate).

label: smulbb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies bottom 16 bits of Rn and Rm.

label: smulbt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies bottom 16 bits of Rn and top 16 bits of Rm.

label: smultb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies top 16 bits of Rn and bottom 16 bits of Rm.

label: smultt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies top 16 bits of Rn and top 16 bits of Rm.

label: smlabb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Accumulates (Rn.B * Rm.B) into Ra.

label: smlabt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Accumulates (Rn.B * Rm.T) into Ra.

label: smlatb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Accumulates (Rn.T * Rm.B) into Ra.

label: smlatt (ARMv8-A)

label: add (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds two 32-bit values.

label: adr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds an immediate value to the PC register.

label: and (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs a bitwise AND on two 32-bit values.

label: asr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Arithmetic right shift (sign-extending).

label: b (ARMv8-A)
summary: Branch relative (PC +/- 32MB).

label: bfc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Clears a bitfield in a register.

label: bfi (ARMv8-A)
summary: Copies a bitfield into a register.

label: bic (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs AND NOT (Rd = Rn & ~Rm).

label: bkpt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Causes a software breakpoint.

label: bl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calls a subroutine, storing return address in LR (R14).

label: blx (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calls subroutine and optionally switches to Thumb state.

label: bx (ARMv8-A)
summary: Branches to address in register, optionally switching ISA.

label: clrex (ARMv8-A)
summary: Clears the local exclusive access monitor.

label: clz (ARMv8-A)
summary: Counts the number of consecutive zeros from MSB.

label: cmn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds two values and updates flags (discarding result). Same as ADDS with no destination.

label: cmp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Subtracts two values and updates flags (discarding result).

label: dmb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Ensures memory access ordering.

label: dsb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Ensures completion of memory accesses.

label: eor (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs bitwise XOR.

label: hvc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calls the Hypervisor (EL2).

label: isb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Flushes the pipeline.

label: ldm (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads multiple registers from memory (Stack pop).

label: ldr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a word from memory.

label: ldrb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a byte from memory (Zero extended).

label: ldrd (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads two consecutive words into consecutive registers.

label: ldrex (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a word and marks physical address as exclusive.

label: ldrh (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a halfword (Zero extended).

label: ldrsb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a byte and sign-extends it.

label: ldrsh (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a halfword and sign-extends it.

label: lsl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts a register left.

label: lsr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts a register right.

label: mla (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calculates Rd = (Rn * Rm) + Ra.

label: mls (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calculates Rd = Ra - (Rn * Rm).

label: mov (ARMv8-A)
summary: Moves a value into a register.

label: movt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Writes a 16-bit immediate to the top half of a register.

label: movw (ARMv8-A)
summary: Writes a 16-bit immediate to the bottom half, zeroing top.

label: mrs (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reads CPSR or SPSR.

label: msr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Writes to CPSR or SPSR.

label: mul (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies two 32-bit values.

label: mvn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Moves bitwise inverse of value.

label: nop (ARMv8-A)
summary: Does nothing.

label: orr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs bitwise OR.

label: pop (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads registers from stack (Alias for LDMIA SP!).

label: push (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores registers to stack (Alias for STMDB SP!).

label: rbit (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reverses bits in a 32-bit register.

label: rev (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reverses bytes (Endian swap).

label: ror (ARMv8-A)
summary: Rotates register right.

label: rsb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calculates Rd = Operand2 - Rn.

label: rsc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calculates Rd = Operand2 - Rn - NOT(Carry).

label: sbc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Calculates Rd = Rn - Operand2 - NOT(Carry).

label: sdiv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Signed integer division.

label: stm (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores multiple registers to memory.

label: str (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores a word to memory.

label: sub (ARMv8-A)
summary: Subtracts two values.

label: svc (ARMv8-A)
summary: System call (formerly SWI).

label: swp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Atomic swap word (Legacy).

label: teq (ARMv8-A)
summary: Bitwise Exclusive OR and update flags (discard result).

label: tst (ARMv8-A)
summary: Bitwise AND and update flags (discard result).

label: udiv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned integer division.

label: umlal (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned (Rn * Rm) + 64-bit Accumulator.

label: umull (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned (Rn * Rm) -> 64-bit Result.

label: vsra (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts elements right and adds to the destination accumulator.

label: vrsra (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts right with rounding and adds to accumulator.

label: vsli (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts bits left and inserts into destination (merging).

label: vsri (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts bits right and inserts into destination.

label: vrshl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts left with rounding based on a register value.

label: vrshr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts right with rounding based on immediate.

label: vrshrn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts right, rounds, and narrows (2N -> N bits).

label: vqshl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts left with saturation based on register.

label: vqshl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts left with saturation based on immediate.

label: vqshr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts right with saturation (Unsigned).

label: vqshrn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts right, saturates, and narrows.

label: vqshlu (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts signed elements left, saturating to unsigned result.

label: vqrshl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts left with saturation and rounding.

label: vqrshrn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts right, saturates, rounds, and narrows.

label: vacge (ARMv8-A)
summary: Compares absolute values (|Vn| >= |Vm|).

label: vacgt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Compares absolute values (|Vn| > |Vm|).

label: vabal (ARMv8-A)
summary: Computes absolute difference of narrow elements and adds to wide acc.

label: vabdl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Computes absolute difference of narrow elements to wide result.

label: vraddhn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds wide elements, rounds, and returns high narrow half.

label: vsubhn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Subtracts wide elements and returns high narrow half.

label: vrsubhn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Subtracts wide elements, rounds, and returns high narrow half.

label: vqdmlal (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies, doubles, saturates, and adds to accumulator (High precision DSP).

label: vqdmlsl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies, doubles, saturates, and subtracts from accumulator.

label: vqdmulh (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies, doubles, saturates, and keeps high half.

label: vqrdmulh (ARMv8-A)
summary: Fixed-point multiply with rounding and saturation.

label: vqdmull (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies narrow elements, doubles, and saturates into wide elements.

label: sxtab (ARMv8-A)
summary: Sign-extends a byte from Rm and adds to Rn.

label: sxtab16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Sign-extends two bytes and adds to two halfwords.

label: sxtah (ARMv8-A)
summary: Sign-extends a halfword and adds to Rn.

label: uxtab (ARMv8-A)
summary: Zero-extends a byte and adds to Rn.

label: uxtab16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Zero-extends two bytes and adds to two halfwords.

label: uxtah (ARMv8-A)
summary: Zero-extends a halfword and adds to Rn.

label: smuad (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs two 16x16 multiplies and adds results (Top*Top + Bot*Bot).

label: smusd (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs two 16x16 multiplies and subtracts results.

label: smlad (ARMv8-A)
summary: Dual multiply add + accumulate.

label: smlsd (ARMv8-A)
summary: Dual multiply subtract + accumulate.

label: smlald (ARMv8-A)
summary: Dual multiply add + 64-bit accumulate.

label: smlsld (ARMv8-A)
summary: Dual multiply subtract + 64-bit accumulate.

label: qadd8 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Parallel saturating add of 4 signed bytes.

label: qadd16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Parallel saturating add of 2 signed halfwords.

label: qsub8 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Parallel saturating subtract of 4 signed bytes.

label: qsub16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Parallel saturating subtract of 2 signed halfwords.

label: shadd8 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Signed add and halving (average) of 4 bytes.

label: shadd16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Signed add and halving (average) of 2 halfwords.

label: shsub8 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Signed subtract and halving of 4 bytes.

label: shsub16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Signed subtract and halving of 2 halfwords.

label: uqadd8 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned saturating add of 4 bytes.

label: uqadd16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned saturating add of 2 halfwords.

label: uqsub8 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned saturating subtract of 4 bytes.

label: uqsub16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned saturating subtract of 2 halfwords.

label: uhadd8 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned average of 4 bytes.

label: uhadd16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned average of 2 halfwords.

label: uhsub8 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned halving subtract of 4 bytes.

label: uhsub16 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Unsigned halving subtract of 2 halfwords.

label: sel (ARMv8-A)
summary: Selects bytes from Rn or Rm based on GE flags.

label: prfm (ARMv8-A)
summary: Signals the memory system to prefetch data into cache.

label: prfm (ARMv8-A)
summary: Prefetches data from a PC-relative address.

label: prfm (ARMv8-A)
summary: Prefetches data using a register offset.

label: ld64b (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a 64-byte block of data atomically (Accelerator support).

label: st64b (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores a 64-byte block of data atomically.

label: st64bv (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores 64 bytes atomically and returns status (Success/Fail).

label: st64bv0 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores 64 bytes (eliding the first 8 bytes as zero) and returns status.

label: dgh (ARMv8-A)
summary: Hints that multiple memory accesses should be merged.

label: sb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Prevents speculative execution across the barrier.

label: tsb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Ensures trace generation is complete.

label: csdb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Prevents speculative data consumption.

label: wfet (ARMv8-A)
summary: Waits for an event or a timeout (using a counter).

label: wfit (ARMv8-A)
summary: Waits for an interrupt or a timeout.

label: bc.cond (ARMv8-A)
summary: Branch if condition is met, with stronger ordering guarantees.

label: ldaprb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a byte with Release Consistency (process consistent) Acquire semantics.

label: ldaprh (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a halfword with RCpc Acquire semantics.

label: ldapr (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads a word with RCpc Acquire semantics.

label: pssbb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Prevents speculation on physical resources.

label: trcit (ARMv8-A)
summary: Generates a trace packet.

label: ld2 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads two-element structures from memory into two registers (De-interleave).

label: st2 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores two-element structures from two registers to memory (Interleave).

label: ld3 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads three-element structures (e.g., RGB) into three registers.

label: st3 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores three-element structures from three registers (Interleave RGB).

label: ld4 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads four-element structures (e.g., RGBA) into four registers.

label: st4 (ARMv8-A)
summary: Stores four-element structures from four registers (Interleave RGBA).

label: ld1r (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads one element and replicates it to all lanes of the vector.

label: ld2r (ARMv8-A)
summary: Loads 2 elements and replicates them to all lanes.

label: movi (ARMv8-A)
summary: Moves an immediate value into every element of a vector.

label: mvni (ARMv8-A)
summary: Moves the inverse of an immediate value into every element.

label: ext (ARMv8-A)
summary: Extracts a vector from a pair of vectors (Sliding window).

label: saddl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds lower/upper halves of signed vectors, producing wider result (Widening).

label: uaddl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds lower/upper halves of unsigned vectors, producing wider result.

label: saddw (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds a wide vector to the lower/upper half of a narrow vector.

label: uaddw (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds a wide vector to the lower/upper half of a narrow vector (Unsigned).

label: ssubl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Subtracts signed narrow vectors, producing wider result.

label: usubl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Subtracts unsigned narrow vectors, producing wider result.

label: pmull (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs polynomial multiplication over {0,1} producing wide result (Used for GCM).

label: smull (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies signed narrow vectors, producing wider result.

label: umull (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies unsigned narrow vectors, producing wider result.

label: smlal (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies signed narrow vectors and adds to wide destination.

label: umlal (ARMv8-A)
summary: Multiplies unsigned narrow vectors and adds to wide destination.

label: shll (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts narrow vector left, extending to wide result.

label: shrn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts wide vector right, narrowing to destination (Upper/Lower).

label: sqxtn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reads wide elements, saturates, and narrows.

label: uqxtn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Reads wide unsigned elements, saturates, and narrows.

label: ssra (ARMv8-A)
summary: Arithmetic right shift and add to destination.

label: usra (ARMv8-A)
summary: Logical right shift and add to destination.

label: sri (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts source right and inserts into destination.

label: sli (ARMv8-A)
summary: Shifts source left and inserts into destination.

label: clz (ARMv8-A)
summary: Counts leading zeros for each element.

label: cnt (ARMv8-A)
summary: Counts set bits (population count) per byte.

label: not (ARMv8-A)
summary: Inverts all bits. (Alias for MVN).

label: urecpe (ARMv8-A)
summary: Estimates reciprocal for unsigned integers.

label: frecpe (ARMv8-A)
summary: Estimates reciprocal (1/x) for floats.

label: frecps (ARMv8-A)
summary: Newton-Raphson step for reciprocal refinement.

label: frsqrte (ARMv8-A)
summary: Estimates reciprocal square root (1/sqrt(x)).

label: frsqrts (ARMv8-A)
summary: Newton-Raphson step for reciprocal square root refinement.

label: fcvtl (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts narrow floats to wide floats (e.g., Half -> Single).

label: fcvtn (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts wide floats to narrow floats (e.g., Single -> Half).

label: fcvtzs (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts floats to signed integers (Truncate).

label: fcvtzu (ARMv8-A)
summary: Converts floats to unsigned integers (Truncate).

label: addp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds adjacent pairs of elements.

label: faddp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Adds adjacent pairs of float elements.

label: fmaxp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Max of adjacent float elements.

label: fminp (ARMv8-A)
summary: Min of adjacent float elements.

label: aese (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs one round of AES encryption.

label: aesd (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs one round of AES decryption.

label: aesmc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs AES Mix Columns transformation.

label: aesimc (ARMv8-A)
summary: Performs AES Inverse Mix Columns transformation.

label: sha1c (ARMv8-A)
summary: SHA1 hash update (Choose function).

label: sha1m (ARMv8-A)
summary: SHA1 hash update (Majority function).

label: sha1p (ARMv8-A)
summary: SHA1 hash update (Parity function).

label: sha256h (ARMv8-A)
summary: SHA256 hash update (part 1).

label: sha256h2 (ARMv8-A)
summary: SHA256 hash update (part 2).

label: crc32b (ARMv8-A)
summary: Updates CRC32 checksum with a byte.

label: crc32w (ARMv8-A)
summary: Updates CRC32 checksum with a word.

label: crc32x (ARMv8-A)
summary: Updates CRC32 checksum with a doubleword (64-bit).

label: crc32cb (ARMv8-A)
summary: Updates CRC32C (Castagnoli) checksum with a byte.
